title: Your thoughts on All for One?
body: Curious, in my opinion, I'd probably just skip it every time it comes up. They're champions that should be automatically disabled or nerfed for the game mode, for example, perhaps limit how much {{champion:74}} can place his turrets for the entire team, because going through 15 turrets + their ulti isn't that fun. Anyways, just wanted to know everyone else's thought's on this game mode.
